fixedBorrowRate(uint256,uint256,uint256,.details: Deprecated in favor of `fixedRate(maturity, maxPools, uFixed, uFloating, uGlobal)`

params.maxPools: number of pools available in the time horizon.

returns._0: the minimum between `base * spread` and `maxRate` with given conditions.
the minimum between `baseRate` and `maxRate` with given conditions.

minFixedRate(uint256,uint256,uint256).details: deprecated in favor of `fixedRate(maturity, maxPools, uFixed, uFloating, uGlobal)`

EXP_THRESHOLD.details: maximum input value for expWad, ~ln((2^255 - 1) / 1e18), represented with 18 decimals.

auxSigmoid.details: auxiliary variable to save an extra operation.

fixedAllocation().notice: liquidity naturally designated to fixed pools, represented with 18 decimals.

fixedRate(uint256,uint256,uint256,uint25.notice: fixed rate with given conditions, represented with 18 decimals.

floatingCurveA().notice: Scale factor of the floating curve.

floatingCurveB().notice: Origin intercept of the floating curve.

floatingRate(uint256,uint256).notice: floating rate with given conditions, represented with 18 decimals.

growthSpeed().notice: speed of growth for the base rate, represented with 18 decimals.

market().notice: Market where the interest rate model is used. Keeps compatibility with legacy interest rate model.

maturitySpeed().notice: speed of maturity for the fixed rate, represented with 18 decimals.

maxRate().notice: maximum interest rate, represented with 18 decimals.

naturalUtilization().notice: natural level of utilization, represented with 18 decimals.

sigmoidSpeed().notice: speed of the sigmoid curve, represented with 18 decimals.

spreadFactor().notice: spread factor for the fixed rate, represented with 18 decimals.

timePreference().notice: time preference for the fixed rate, represented with 18 decimals.
